append.name: allow_duplicates
append.description: If false, the processor does not append values already present in the field.

append.name: description
append.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

append.name: field
append.description: The field to be appended to. Supports template snippets.

append.name: if
append.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

append.name: ignore_failure
append.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

append.name: media_type
append.description: The media type for encoding value. Applies only when value is a template snippet. Must be one of application/json, text/plain, or application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

append.name: on_failure
append.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

append.name: tag
append.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

append.name: value
append.description: The value to be appended. Supports template snippets.

attachment.name: field
attachment.description: The field to get the base64 encoded field from

attachment.name: ignore_missing
attachment.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

attachment.name: indexed_chars
attachment.description: The number of chars being used for extraction to prevent huge fields. Use -1 for no limit.

attachment.name: indexed_chars_field
attachment.description: Field name from which you can overwrite the number of chars being used for extraction. See indexed_chars.

attachment.name: properties
attachment.description: Array of properties to select to be stored. Can be content, title, name, author, keywords, date, content_type, content_length, language

attachment.name: remove_binary
attachment.description: If true, the binary field will be removed from the document

attachment.name: resource_name
attachment.description: Field containing the name of the resource to decode. If specified, the processor passes this resource name to the underlying Tika library to enable Resource Name Based Detection.

attachment.name: target_field
attachment.description: The field that will hold the attachment information

bytes.name: description
bytes.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

bytes.name: if
bytes.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

bytes.name: ignore_failure
bytes.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

bytes.name: ignore_missing
bytes.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

bytes.name: on_failure
bytes.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

bytes.name: tag
bytes.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

bytes.name: target_field
bytes.description: The field to assign the converted value to, by default field is updated in-place

circle.name: description
circle.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

circle.name: error_distance
circle.description: The difference between the resulting inscribed distance from center to side and the circle’s radius (measured in meters for geo_shape, unit-less for shape)

circle.name: field
circle.description: The string-valued field to trim whitespace from

circle.name: if
circle.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

circle.name: ignore_failure
circle.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

circle.name: ignore_missing
circle.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

circle.name: on_failure
circle.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

circle.name: shape_type
circle.description: which field mapping type is to be used when processing the circle: geo_shape or shape

circle.name: tag
circle.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

circle.name: target_field
circle.description: The field to assign the polygon shape to, by default field is updated in-place

community_id.name: description
community_id.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

community_id.name: destination_ip
community_id.description: Field containing the destination IP address.

community_id.name: if
community_id.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

community_id.name: ignore_failure
community_id.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

community_id.name: ignore_missing
community_id.description: If true and any required fields are missing, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document.

community_id.name: on_failure
community_id.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

community_id.name: seed
community_id.description: Seed for the community ID hash. Must be between 0 and 65535 (inclusive). The seed can prevent hash collisions between network domains, such as a staging and production network that use the same addressing scheme.

community_id.name: source_ip
community_id.description: Field containing the source IP address.

community_id.name: tag
community_id.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

community_id.name: target_field
community_id.description: Output field for the community ID.

community_id.name: transport
community_id.description: Field containing the transport protocol. Used only when the iana_number field is not present.

convert.name: description
convert.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

convert.name: field
convert.description: The field whose value is to be converted

convert.name: if
convert.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

convert.name: ignore_failure
convert.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

convert.name: ignore_missing
convert.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

convert.name: on_failure
convert.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

convert.name: tag
convert.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

convert.name: target_field
convert.description: The field to assign the converted value to, by default field is updated in-place

convert.name: type
convert.description: The type to convert the existing value to

csv.name: description
csv.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

csv.name: empty_value
csv.description: Value used to fill empty fields, empty fields will be skipped if this is not provided.                                              Empty field is one with no value (2 consecutive separators) or empty quotes ("")

csv.name: field
csv.description: The field to extract data from

csv.name: if
csv.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

csv.name: ignore_failure
csv.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

csv.name: ignore_missing
csv.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

csv.name: on_failure
csv.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

csv.name: quote
csv.description: Quote used in CSV, has to be single character string

csv.name: separator
csv.description: Separator used in CSV, has to be single character string

csv.name: tag
csv.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

csv.name: target_fields
csv.description: The array of fields to assign extracted values to

date.name: description
date.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

date.name: field
date.description: The field to get the date from.

date.name: formats
date.description: An array of the expected date formats. Can be a java time pattern or one of the following formats: ISO8601, UNIX, UNIX_MS, or TAI64N.

date.name: if
date.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

date.name: ignore_failure
date.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

date.name: locale
date.description: The locale to use when parsing the date, relevant when parsing month names or week days. Supports template snippets.

date.name: on_failure
date.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

date.name: output_format
date.description: The format to use when writing the date to target_field. Must be a valid java time pattern.

date.name: tag
date.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

date.name: target_field
date.description: The field that will hold the parsed date.

date.name: timezone
date.description: The timezone to use when parsing the date. Supports template snippets.

date_index_name.name: date_formats
date_index_name.description: An array of the expected date formats for parsing dates / timestamps in the document being preprocessed. Can be a java time pattern or one of the following formats: ISO8601, UNIX, UNIX_MS, or TAI64N.

date_index_name.name: date_rounding
date_index_name.description: How to round the date when formatting the date into the index name. Valid values are: y (year), M (month), w (week), d (day), h (hour), m (minute) and s (second). Supports template snippets.

date_index_name.name: description
date_index_name.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

date_index_name.name: field
date_index_name.description: The field to get the date or timestamp from.

date_index_name.name: if
date_index_name.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

date_index_name.name: ignore_failure
date_index_name.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

date_index_name.name: index_name_format
date_index_name.description: The format to be used when printing the parsed date into the index name. A valid java time pattern is expected here. Supports template snippets.

date_index_name.name: index_name_prefix
date_index_name.description: A prefix of the index name to be prepended before the printed date. Supports template snippets.

date_index_name.name: locale
date_index_name.description: The locale to use when parsing the date from the document being preprocessed, relevant when parsing month names or week days.

date_index_name.name: on_failure
date_index_name.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

date_index_name.name: tag
date_index_name.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

date_index_name.name: timezone
date_index_name.description: The timezone to use when parsing the date and when date math index supports resolves expressions into concrete index names.

dissect.name: append_separator
dissect.description: The character(s) that separate the appended fields.

dissect.name: description
dissect.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

dissect.name: if
dissect.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

dissect.name: ignore_failure
dissect.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

dissect.name: ignore_missing
dissect.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

dissect.name: on_failure
dissect.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

dissect.name: pattern
dissect.description: The pattern to apply to the field

dissect.name: tag
dissect.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

dot_expander.name: description
dot_expander.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

dot_expander.name: field
dot_expander.description: The field to expand into an object field. If set to *, all top-level fields will be expanded.

dot_expander.name: if
dot_expander.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

dot_expander.name: ignore_failure
dot_expander.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

dot_expander.name: on_failure
dot_expander.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

dot_expander.name: override
dot_expander.description: Controls the behavior when there is already an existing nested object that conflicts with the expanded field. When false, the processor will merge conflicts by combining the old and the new values into an array. When true, the value from the expanded field will overwrite the existing value.

dot_expander.name: path
dot_expander.description: The field that contains the field to expand. Only required if the field to expand is part another object field, because the field option can only understand leaf fields.

dot_expander.name: tag
dot_expander.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

drop.name: description
drop.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

drop.name: if
drop.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

drop.name: ignore_failure
drop.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

drop.name: on_failure
drop.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

drop.name: tag
drop.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

enrich.name: description
enrich.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

enrich.name: field
enrich.description: The field in the input document that matches the policies match_field used to retrieve the enrichment data. Supports template snippets.

enrich.name: if
enrich.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

enrich.name: ignore_failure
enrich.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

enrich.name: ignore_missing
enrich.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

enrich.name: max_matches
enrich.description: The maximum number of matched documents to include under the configured target field. The target_field will be turned into a json array if max_matches is higher than 1, otherwise target_field will become a json object. In order to avoid documents getting too large, the maximum allowed value is 128.

enrich.name: on_failure
enrich.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

enrich.name: override
enrich.description: If processor will update fields with pre-existing non-null-valued field. When set to false, such fields will not be touched.

enrich.name: policy_name
enrich.description: The name of the enrich policy to use.

enrich.name: shape_relation
enrich.description: A spatial relation operator used to match the geoshape of incoming documents to documents in the enrich index. This option is only used for geo_match enrich policy types. See Spatial Relations for operators and more information.

enrich.name: tag
enrich.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

enrich.name: target_field
enrich.description: Field added to incoming documents to contain enrich data. This field contains both the match_field and enrich_fields specified in the enrich policy. Supports template snippets.

fail.name: description
fail.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

fail.name: if
fail.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

fail.name: ignore_failure
fail.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

fail.name: message
fail.description: The error message thrown by the processor. Supports template snippets.

fail.name: on_failure
fail.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

fail.name: tag
fail.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

fingerprint.name: description
fingerprint.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

fingerprint.name: fields
fingerprint.description: Array of fields to include in the fingerprint. For objects, the processor hashes both the field key and value. For other fields, the processor hashes only the field value.

fingerprint.name: if
fingerprint.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

fingerprint.name: ignore_failure
fingerprint.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

fingerprint.name: ignore_missing
fingerprint.description: If true, the processor ignores any missing fields. If all fields are missing, the processor silently exits without modifying the document.

fingerprint.name: method
fingerprint.description: The hash method used to compute the fingerprint. Must be one of MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512, or MurmurHash3.

fingerprint.name: on_failure
fingerprint.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

fingerprint.name: salt
fingerprint.description: Salt value for the hash function.

fingerprint.name: tag
fingerprint.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

foreach.name: description
foreach.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

foreach.name: field
foreach.description: Field containing array or object values.

foreach.name: if
foreach.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

foreach.name: ignore_failure
foreach.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

foreach.name: ignore_missing
foreach.description: If true, the processor silently exits without changing the document if the field is null or missing.

foreach.name: on_failure
foreach.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

foreach.name: processor
foreach.description: Ingest processor to run on each element.

foreach.name: tag
foreach.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

geoip.name: database_file
geoip.description: The database filename referring to a database the module ships with (GeoLite2-City.mmdb, GeoLite2-Country.mmdb, or GeoLite2-ASN.mmdb) or a custom database in the ingest-geoip config directory.

geoip.name: field
geoip.description: The field to get the ip address from for the geographical lookup.

geoip.name: first_only
geoip.description: If true only first found geoip data will be returned, even if field contains array

geoip.name: ignore_missing
geoip.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

geoip.name: properties
geoip.default: [continent_name, country_iso_code, country_name, region_iso_code, region_name, city_name, location] *
geoip.description: Controls what properties are added to the target_field based on the geoip lookup.

geoip.name: target_field
geoip.description: The field that will hold the geographical information looked up from the MaxMind database.

grok.name: description
grok.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

grok.name: ecs_compatibility
grok.description: Must be disabled or v1. If v1, the processor uses patterns with Elastic Common Schema (ECS) field names.

grok.name: field
grok.description: The field to use for grok expression parsing

grok.name: if
grok.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

grok.name: ignore_failure
grok.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

grok.name: ignore_missing
grok.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

grok.name: on_failure
grok.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

grok.name: pattern_definitions
grok.description: A map of pattern-name and pattern tuples defining custom patterns to be used by the current processor. Patterns matching existing names will override the pre-existing definition.

grok.name: patterns
grok.description: An ordered list of grok expression to match and extract named captures with. Returns on the first expression in the list that matches.

grok.name: tag
grok.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

grok.name: trace_match
grok.description: when true, _ingest._grok_match_index will be inserted into your matched document’s metadata with the index into the pattern found in patterns that matched.

gsub.name: description
gsub.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

gsub.name: field
gsub.description: The field to apply the replacement to

gsub.name: if
gsub.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

gsub.name: ignore_failure
gsub.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

gsub.name: ignore_missing
gsub.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

gsub.name: on_failure
gsub.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

gsub.name: replacement
gsub.description: The string to replace the matching patterns with

gsub.name: tag
gsub.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

gsub.name: target_field
gsub.description: The field to assign the converted value to, by default field is updated in-place

html_strip.name: description
html_strip.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

html_strip.name: field
html_strip.description: The string-valued field to remove HTML tags from

html_strip.name: if
html_strip.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

html_strip.name: ignore_failure
html_strip.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

html_strip.name: ignore_missing
html_strip.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

html_strip.name: on_failure
html_strip.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

html_strip.name: tag
html_strip.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

html_strip.name: target_field
html_strip.description: The field to assign the value to, by default field is updated in-place

inference.name: description
inference.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

inference.name: field_map
inference.default: If defined the model’s default field map
inference.description: (Object) Maps the document field names to the known field names of the model. This mapping takes precedence over any default mappings provided in the model configuration.

inference.name: if
inference.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

inference.name: ignore_failure
inference.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

inference.name: inference_config
inference.default: The default settings defined in the model
inference.description: (Object) Contains the inference type and its options.

inference.name: model_id
inference.description: (String) The ID or alias for the trained model.

inference.name: on_failure
inference.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

inference.name: tag
inference.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

inference.name: target_field
inference.description: (String) Field added to incoming documents to contain results objects.

join.name: description
join.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

join.name: field
join.description: Field containing array values to join

join.name: if
join.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

join.name: ignore_failure
join.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

join.name: on_failure
join.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

join.name: tag
join.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

join.name: target_field
join.description: The field to assign the joined value to, by default field is updated in-place

json.name: add_to_root
json.description: Flag that forces the parsed JSON to be added at the top level of the document. target_field must not be set when this option is chosen.

json.name: add_to_root_conflict_strategy
json.description: When set to replace, root fields that conflict with fields from the parsed JSON will be overridden. When set to merge, conflicting fields will be merged. Only applicable if add_to_root is set to true.

json.name: allow_duplicate_keys
json.description: When set to true, the JSON parser will not fail if the JSON contains duplicate keys. Instead, the last encountered value for any duplicate key wins.

json.name: description
json.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

json.name: if
json.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

json.name: ignore_failure
json.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

json.name: on_failure
json.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

json.name: tag
json.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

json.name: target_field
json.description: The field that the converted structured object will be written into. Any existing content in this field will be overwritten.

kv.name: description
kv.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

kv.name: exclude_keys
kv.description: List of keys to exclude from document

kv.name: field
kv.description: The field to be parsed. Supports template snippets.

kv.name: field_split
kv.description: Regex pattern to use for splitting key-value pairs

kv.name: if
kv.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

kv.name: ignore_failure
kv.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

kv.name: ignore_missing
kv.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

kv.name: include_keys
kv.description: List of keys to filter and insert into document. Defaults to including all keys

kv.name: on_failure
kv.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

kv.name: prefix
kv.description: Prefix to be added to extracted keys

kv.name: strip_brackets
kv.description: If true strip brackets (), <>, [] as well as quotes ' and " from extracted values

kv.name: tag
kv.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

kv.name: target_field
kv.description: The field to insert the extracted keys into. Defaults to the root of the document. Supports template snippets.

kv.name: trim_key
kv.description: String of characters to trim from extracted keys

kv.name: trim_value
kv.description: String of characters to trim from extracted values

kv.name: value_split
kv.description: Regex pattern to use for splitting the key from the value within a key-value pair

lowercase.name: description
lowercase.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

lowercase.name: if
lowercase.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

lowercase.name: ignore_failure

lowercase.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

lowercase.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

lowercase.name: tag
lowercase.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

lowercase.name: target_field
lowercase.description: The field to assign the converted value to, by default field is updated in-place

network_direction.name: description
network_direction.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

network_direction.name: destination_ip
network_direction.description: Field containing the destination IP address.

network_direction.name: if
network_direction.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

network_direction.name: ignore_failure
network_direction.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

network_direction.name: ignore_missing
network_direction.description: If true and any required fields are missing, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document.

network_direction.name: internal_networks
network_direction.description: List of internal networks. Supports IPv4 and IPv6 addresses and ranges in CIDR notation. Also supports the named ranges listed below. These may be constructed with template snippets. * Must specify only one of internal_networks or internal_networks_field.

network_direction.name: internal_networks_field
network_direction.description: A field on the given document to read the internal_networks configuration from.

network_direction.name: on_failure
network_direction.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

network_direction.name: source_ip
network_direction.description: Field containing the source IP address.

network_direction.name: tag
network_direction.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

network_direction.name: target_field
network_direction.description: Output field for the network direction.

pipeline.name: description
pipeline.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

pipeline.name: if
pipeline.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

pipeline.name: ignore_failure
pipeline.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

pipeline.name: ignore_missing_pipeline
pipeline.description: Whether to ignore missing pipelines instead of failing.

pipeline.name: name
pipeline.description: The name of the pipeline to execute. Supports template snippets.

pipeline.name: on_failure
pipeline.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

pipeline.name: tag
pipeline.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

registered_domain.name: description
registered_domain.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

registered_domain.name: if
registered_domain.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

registered_domain.name: ignore_failure
registered_domain.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

registered_domain.name: ignore_missing
registered_domain.description: If true and any required fields are missing, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document.

registered_domain.name: on_failure
registered_domain.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

registered_domain.name: tag
registered_domain.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

registered_domain.name: target_field
registered_domain.description: Object field containing extracted domain components. If an <empty string>, the processor adds components to the document’s root.

remove.name: description
remove.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

remove.name: field
remove.description: Fields to be removed. Supports template snippets.

remove.name: if
remove.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

remove.name: ignore_failure
remove.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

remove.name: ignore_missing
remove.description: If true and field does not exist or is null, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

remove.name: on_failure
remove.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

remove.name: tag
remove.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

rename.name: description
rename.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

rename.name: field
rename.description: The field to be renamed. Supports template snippets.

rename.name: if
rename.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

rename.name: ignore_failure
rename.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

rename.name: ignore_missing
rename.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

rename.name: on_failure
rename.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

rename.name: tag
rename.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

rename.name: target_field
rename.description: The new name of the field. Supports template snippets.

script.name: description
script.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

script.name: id
script.description: ID of a stored script.                                          If no source is specified, this parameter is required.

script.name: if
script.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

script.name: ignore_failure
script.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

script.name: on_failure
script.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

script.name: params
script.description: Object containing parameters for the script.

script.name: source
script.description: Inline script.                                          If no id is specified, this parameter is required.

script.name: tag
script.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

set.name: copy_from
set.description: The origin field which will be copied to field, cannot set value simultaneously. Supported data types are boolean, number, array, object, string, date, etc.

set.name: description
set.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

set.name: field
set.description: The field to insert, upsert, or update. Supports template snippets.

set.name: if
set.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

set.name: ignore_empty_value
set.description: If true and value is a template snippet that evaluates to null or the empty string, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

set.name: ignore_failure
set.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

set.name: media_type
set.description: The media type for encoding value. Applies only when value is a template snippet. Must be one of application/json, text/plain, or application/x-www-form-urlencoded.

set.name: on_failure
set.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

set.name: override
set.description: If processor will update fields with pre-existing non-null-valued field. When set to false, such fields will not be touched.

set.name: tag
set.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

set.name: value
set.description: The value to be set for the field. Supports template snippets. May specify only one of value or copy_from.

set_security_user.name: description
set_security_user.description: Description of the processor. Useful for describing the purpose of the processor or its configuration.

set_security_user.name: field
set_security_user.description: The field to store the user information into.

set_security_user.name: if
set_security_user.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

set_security_user.name: ignore_failure
set_security_user.description: Ignore failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

set_security_user.name: on_failure
set_security_user.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

set_security_user.name: properties
set_security_user.default: [username, roles, email, full_name, metadata, api_key, realm, authentication_type]
set_security_user.description: Controls what user related properties are added to the field.

set_security_user.name: tag
set_security_user.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

sort.description: Conditionally execute the processor. See Conditionally run a processor.

sort.name: order
sort.description: The sort order to use. Accepts "asc" or "desc".

sort.name: target_field
sort.description: The field to assign the sorted value to, by default field is updated in-place

split.name: preserve_trailing

split.name: tag
split.description: Identifier for the processor. Useful for debugging and metrics.

split.name: target_field
split.description: The field to assign the split value to, by default field is updated in-place

uri_parts.name: ignore_failure

uri_parts.name: keep_original
uri_parts.description: If true, the processor copies the unparsed URI to <target_field>.original.

uri_parts.name: on_failure
uri_parts.description: Handle failures for the processor. See Handling pipeline failures.

uri_parts.name: remove_if_successful
uri_parts.description: If true, the processor removes the field after parsing the URI string. If parsing fails, the processor does not remove the field.

uri_parts.name: tag

uri_parts.name: target_field

user_agent.name: extract_device_type
user_agent.description: [beta]  This functionality is in beta and is subject to change. The design and code is less mature than official GA features and is being provided as-is with no warranties. Beta features are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.   Extracts device type from the user agent string on a best-effort basis.

user_agent.name: field
user_agent.description: The field containing the user agent string.

user_agent.name: ignore_missing
user_agent.description: If true and field does not exist, the processor quietly exits without modifying the document

user_agent.name: properties
user_agent.default: [name, major, minor, patch, build, os, os_name, os_major, os_minor, device]
user_agent.description: Controls what properties are added to target_field.

user_agent.name: regex_file
user_agent.description: The name of the file in the config/ingest-user-agent directory containing the regular expressions for parsing the user agent string. Both the directory and the file have to be created before starting Elasticsearch. If not specified, ingest-user-agent will use the regexes.yaml from uap-core it ships with (see below).

user_agent.name: target_field
user_agent.description: The field that will be filled with the user agent details.
